data.text: We stayed 9 days in City premiere, amazing location , perfect service just a few things they need to change like technically things in bathroom, you receive a bottle of watter every day, cleaning service really nice. Is really close to metro station, you can have a nice walks in marina
data.title: Nice spot

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you for taking the time and effort to share your review from your recent stay. We are happy that you chose City Premiere Marina Hotel Apartments as your accommodation on this occasion. It is nice to hear that you liked everything about the prime location and the services by our team. The hotel is located in the central area and is very accessible to many selections of food, markets, malls, the metro, and the Jumeirah beach. It is an ideal location for those who wish to explore the city of Dubai. Once again, thank you so much for choosing us and your support during your stay in Dubai. We look forward to seeing and welcoming you back again on your next stay!

Regards,

Mohamed Dessouky
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Dessouky

data.text:
I stayed for 10 days in the apartment. The apartment was neat,bathroom needed to be updated,geyser never work properly,(had hot water just for 2 mins and when my spouse wanted to shower,water was cold) ,even though I called reception to check.  Nothing was done to fix the problem with geyser. The apartment was clean every day accept the bathroom sink wasn't cleaned

The reception, the two managers that were on duty was excellent with knowledgeof dubai,accept the ladies at reception,  which never either understand me or when I called from my room to say I can't  get hold of room services to send extra towels,nothing  was done. The ladies at reception need to go training on how to speak to guests of hotel as well as speak English. A little knowledge of Dubai ,could be helpful. 

A big thank you to Aslam Khan from the Travel agent at hotel premises, for his great assistance for organizing all of trips to see abu dhabi ,desert safari etc. 

The staff and manager at the restaurant for breakfast were very friendly and especially to Laxman,a waiter,who knew what I drank every morning and served me with always a smile. Also to Glory and the other ladies, which I can't recall with names.,Well done!

Overall I had a lovely stay at the hotel.A hotel that is central to Dubai Marina Mall,metro station,restaurants and supermarket etc
data.title: An apartment with great view and centre point to mall,restaurants  and metro train

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. George, 

We would like to extend our heartfelt gratitude for choosing to stay with us at the City Premiere Marina Hotel Apartments during your visit to Dubai. We appreciate the time and effort you took to share your comments and ratings with us. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the wonderful location of the hotel, the beautiful view from your bedroom, and the excellent services provided by our team. It was our pleasure to serve you during your stay.

Our hotel is located in the central area of Dubai, making it easier for our guests to explore the city. We are also delighted to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet and the services provided by our team.

However, we are sorry you encountered some issues during your stay, including faulty facilities and delayed responses. We apologize for the inconvenience caused and have already forwarded your concerns to the relevant departments for immediate action. We value your feedback and will use it as a guide for improvement.

Once again, thank you for choosing us as your host, and for your continued support. We hope to see you again soon and look forward to welcoming you back to City Premiere Marina Hotel Apartments.

Mohamed Dessouky
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Dessouky

data.text:
Excellent Stay from start to finish - nothing was too much trouble for the friendly and welcoming reception staff 
Housekeeping staff very efficient 
Ideal location for Marina and Metro 
Choice of 3 swimming pools 
Washing machine + fridge freezer in kitchen area of apartment 
Would highly recommend this hotel/apartments to anyone visiting Dubai
data.title: Brilliant Stay! Thank you

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you very much for choosing City Premiere Marina as your accommodation during your stay in Dubai. We are delighted to hear that you had an excellent stay and that you were very pleased with the hotel's overall services. We are glad to know that you appreciated the hard work of our team, the facilities, and the hotel's beautiful location. Your feedback is highly appreciated, and we are grateful for your kind words. The hotel's central location makes it very convenient and accessible to several essential establishments. It is surrounded by restaurants, markets, malls, the metro, and the beach, all within walking distance. We would like to thank you once again for choosing to stay with us and for your kind words throughout your experience. We look forward to serving you again on your next vacation stay!
Regards,

Mohamed Dessouky
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Dessouky

data.text: The location is one of the best in Dubai, right between Marina and JLT and only a few blocks from Sobha Realty metro station. The rooms are also quite nice and the apart-hotel style is useful for those who want to cook or wash clothes while on their journey (our room had a washing machine and kitchen). The staff was also extremely helpful and kind when I accidentally left some clothes in our room after checkout, keeping them in the lost and found for me until I realized that I had left items behind and promptly returning them to me when I returned for them. Highly recommended.
data.title: Great Service and Great Location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your positive review and excellent rating with us! We truly appreciate your support and for choosing City Premiere Marina Hotel Apartments as your accommodation during your stay in Dubai City. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed both the hotel and the surrounding area, which offers a great selection of restaurants and easy access to the beach. Our central location makes it easy for our guests to explore all that Dubai has to offer. We're also happy to hear that you liked everything about the services provided by our team and the amenities in the hotel. Each bedroom apartment is designed to provide comfort and a homelike experience to our guests, and we're glad that you enjoyed it. Once again, thank you for your kind words and for appreciating the hotel's overall services. We hope to see you again on your next visit and provide you with the same level of good service and comfort.

Regards,

Mohamed Dessouky
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Dessouky

data.text: An excellent experience all round. The service from the staff was consistently first class and the food was excellent. The apartment was very big and offered high quality accommodation. The location behind the Marina was ideal and this hotel is highly recommended.
data.title: An excellent experience.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear valued guest,

We wanted to extend a big thank you to all of us here at City Premiere Marina for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had an outstanding experience during your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to let us know that we met your expectations and that everything went well.

We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the hotel's overall services, including the beautiful location, the spacious bedroom apartment, the excellent service from our team, and the delicious food served. Our hotel is located in a central area, making it easily accessible to many restaurants, markets, malls, the metro, and the beach.

It was our pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again in the future. Thank you once again for choosing City Premiere Marina.

Regards,

Mohamed Dessouky
Resident Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Dessouky
